item.title: Vagrant
item.author: Author
item.description: Box Download Box It is possible to download from the Vagrant Cloud some images pre-created by users and the hashicorp. From shell just type: 1 vagrant box add hashicorp/precise64 This will download (if not already present in the image list) the box precise64 ie an Ubuntu 12.04 64 bit system. item.title: Chef-Solo
item.author: Author
item.description: Terminology Node: The deployment target - this is what configured, has chef-client or chef-solo installed Chef Client: a command line tool that configures servers. Chef Server: This is where all your code resides. It also contains all the information about nodes. N.B = combined with a Node when using Chef-Solo.
